sentences.sentence: You can log into this, not only chat with this interactively, but on the right-hand side here, you can actually grant us view or control of your own screen.
sentences.translation: 你可以登录这个，不仅仅是与这进行交互式聊天，在右边这里，你可以让我们查看或控制你自己的屏幕。

sentences.sentence: You can also edit the history interactively.
sentences.translation: 还可以交互式地编辑历史。
以交互方式编译和测试eunit。
